text: James Hayward Harlow is an electrical engineer working for Harlow Engineering Associates in Mentone, Alabama. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for his leadership in IEEE technical and standardization committees on transformer technology. ==References== Category:20th-century births Category:Living people Category:American electrical engineers Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: James Hayward Harlow
